Title: Griffth, Griffith J., typescript copy of letter to his son, San Quentin Prison, December 20, 1905
Description.abstract: Griffith describes his life in prison, offers advice about his son's education, mentions Griffith Park, shares news of deaths of acquaintances.

Title: Griffith, Griffith J., typed letter to the Mayor and City Council of Los Angeles, December 21, 1912
Description.abstract: Proposes donation of Griffith Park to city of Los Angeles.

Subject: Griffith family--Archives
Name.creator: Griffith, Griffith J.
Title: Last will and testament of Griffith J. Griffith
Description.abstract: Makes provisions for distribution of funds, personal effects and property. Directs that funds from a trust be used to construct the Greek Theater and Observatory in Griffith Park, Los Angeles.
